Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Genetic Disorder/Hyperimmunoglobulin Syndrome/Hyperimmunoglobulin M Syndrome
Record.Description: An immunodeficiency state characterized by very low serum IgG and IgA but either a normal or, more frequently, a markedly elevated concentration of polyclonal IgM.
